attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: smoking is bad for the smoker and the people around them. it is also bad for the environment as paper is used. the people who smoke are just paying to kill themselves, stopping smokers smoking will make their life expectancy longer! Smoking should be banned for non smokers and smokers.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
